issues.shortMessage: A static field in a generic type is not shared among instances of different close constructed types.
issues.fullMessage: A static field in a generic type is not shared among instances of different closed constructed types, If you need to have a static field shared among instances with different generic arguments, define a non-generic base class to store your static members, then set your generic type to inherit from the base class.

properties.title: Static fields should not be used in generic types
